text: The staff is outstanding, and the doctor attentively listens while explaining details in straightforward terms. This clinic is superb. They are also quick with their billing and medicine delivery.

I highly recommend this clinic for their outstanding care and professionalism. The doctors here truly take their time to diagnose thoroughly and even follow up after consultations. Special thanks to Dr. Mark and Dr. Lo, who went above and beyond for my family.

I had difficulty breathing and initially thought it was prolonged COVID symptoms. Thankfully, they suspected an asthma attack and immediately referred me to the hospital. indeed, they were right. My daughter also had a persistent fever and abdominal pain for over a week, and they suspected appendicitis. She was referred for further checks, and Dr. Mark personally followed up on her progress, which was truly reassuring.

This is definitely a clinic I trust for their medical expertise, dedication, and genuine care for their patients. Highly recommended! üëèüëèüëè
Dr Mark is a patient, caring family doctor. My son likes to see him! His reception staff are also very helpful and kind.

Going clinic got good experience ah, first, the staff super friendly, like they smile and talk politely, not rush you one. The place also clean-clean, got nice smell, not those scary hospital smell. The doctor steady, listen properly to your problems, explain clearly, won‚Äôt rush you out. The nurse very patient, help you with smile. Wait also not very long, got aircon, magazines. After finish, they give proper advice and medicine, feel like they really care. Walk out feeling assured and happier, like worth coming.

A great clinic! Dr. Mark Liew is very competent, very approachable and takes a lot of time for his patients. The receptionists are also always friendly and do everything to help you. Our whole family loves coming here.
